name: dynamodb-data-types
description: A utility to help represent Amazon DynamoDB Data Types.

scripts.test: npm run test_ && npm run test-preserve-arrays
scripts.test_: istanbul cover --include-all-sources --dir coverage/spec --root lib jasmine-node tests/spec
scripts.test-preserve-arrays: istanbul cover --include-all-sources --dir coverage/spec-preserve-arrays --root lib jasmine-node tests/spec-preserve-arrays
scripts.build: npm run build-browser && npm run build-browser-with-buffer
scripts.build-browser: browserify --ignore buffer browser.js > dist/dynamodb-data-types.js && uglifyjs dist/dynamodb-data-types.js --source-map dist/dynamodb-data-types.min.map -o dist/dynamodb-data-types.min.js
